Uses of Class
boardgame.Board

Packages that use Board
Package Description
boardgame
This package corresponds to the game board layer.
chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of Board in boardgame

    Fields in boardgame declared as Board
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Board Piece.board  
    Methods in boardgame that return Board
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected Board Piece.getBoard()  
    Constructors in boardgame with parameters of type Board
    Constructor Description
    Piece​(Board board)
    Creates a piece that belongs to a board but is not yet placed on that board.

  • Uses of Board in chess

    Fields in chess declared as Board
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Board ChessMatch.board  
    Constructors in chess with parameters of type Board
    Constructor Description
    ChessPiece​(Board board, Color color)
    creates a chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color

  • Uses of Board in chess.pieces

    Constructors in chess.pieces with parameters of type Board
    Constructor Description
    Bishop​(Board board, Color color)
    creates the bishop chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
    King​(Board board, Color color, ChessMatch chessMatch)
    creates the king chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color besides having an dependency with a chess match
    Knight​(Board board, Color color)
    creates the knight chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
    Pawn​(Board board, Color color, ChessMatch chessMatch)
    creates the pawn chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color besides having an dependency with a chess match
    Queen​(Board board, Color color)
    creates the queen chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
    Rook​(Board board, Color color)
    creates the rook chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
